mapper.sql: m.ORDER_KEY, m.ORG_ORDER_KEY, m.DMS_RELATED_KEY, m.ORG_DMS_RELATED_KEY, m.INS_CODE, m.MCHNT_CODE, m.SHOP_CODE, m.SPONSOR, m.USER_ID, m.PRI_ACCT_NO, m.CARD_NO, m.USER_INF_USER_NAME, m.PRODUCT_CODE, m.TRANS_CURR_CD, m.TRANS_CHNL, m.ORDER_AMT, m.ORDER_STAT, m.TRANS_FEE, m.TRANS_FEE_TYPE, m.TFR_IN_ACCT_NO, m.TFR_OUT_ACCT_NO, m.DATA_STAT, m.REMARKS, m.CREATE_USER, m.UPDATE_USER, m.CREATE_TIME, m.UPDATE_TIME, m.LOCK_VERSION

d.ORDER_LIST_ID, d.ORDER_KEY, d.SETTLE_DATE, d.TXN_FLOW_NO, d.ORG_TXN_FLOW_NO, d.TRANS_ID, d.TRANS_ST, d.COMMODITY_NAME, d.COMMODITY_NUM, d.TRANS_AMT, d.UPLOAD_AMT, d.RESP_CODE, d.ORDER_RESP_STAT, d.SIGN_TYPE, d.NOTIFY_TYPE, d.NOTIFY_URL, d.REDIRECT_TYPE, d.REDIRECT_URL, d.ADDITIONAL_INFO, d.DATA_STAT, d.REMARKS, d.CREATE_USER, d.UPDATE_USER, d.CREATE_TIME, d.UPDATE_TIME, d.LOCK_VERSION
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WX_TRANS_ORDER ( ORDER_KEY, ORG_ORDER_KEY, DMS_RELATED_KEY, ORG_DMS_RELATED_KEY, INS_CODE, MCHNT_CODE, SHOP_CODE, SPONSOR, USER_ID, PRI_ACCT_NO, CARD_NO, USER_INF_USER_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, TRANS_CURR_CD, TRANS_CHNL, ORDER_STAT, ORDER_AMT, TRANS_FEE, TRANS_FEE_TYPE, TFR_IN_ACCT_NO, TFR_OUT_ACCT_NO, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{orderKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgOrderKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDmsRelatedKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sponsor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userInfUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transCurrCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transChnl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrInAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrOutAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '99999999', '99999999', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM TB_WX_TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL d WHERE d.ORDER_KEY = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DATA_STAT = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WX_TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL ( ORDER_LIST_ID, ORDER_KEY, TRANS_ID, TRANS_ST, COMMODITY_NAME, COMMODITY_NUM, TRANS_AMT, UPLOAD_AMT, RESP_CODE, SIGN_TYPE, NOTIFY_TYPE, NOTIFY_URL, REDIRECT_TYPE, REDIRECT_URL, ORDER_RESP_STAT, ADDITIONAL_INFO, DATA_STAT, REMARKS, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, LOCK_VERSION ) VALUES ( #{orderListId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redirectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderRespStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{additionalInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '99999999', '99999999', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_WX_TRANS_ORDER_DETAIL SET
TRANS_ST = #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRANS_ID = #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TXN_FLOW_NO = #{txnFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_TXN_FLOW_NO = #{orgTxnFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESP_CODE=#{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_RESP_STAT = #{orderRespStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE, LOCK_VERSION=LOCK_VERSION+1 WHERE ORDER_LIST_ID = #{orderListId}
